title: Creatine monohydrate and resistance training
summary: Creatine monohydrate improves strength and lean mass in resistance-trained adults.

title: Caffeine dosing and performance
summary: Caffeine at 3–6 mg/kg enhances power and endurance; monitor sensitivity.

title: Beta-alanine supplementation
summary: Beta-alanine (3.2–6.4 g/day) increases muscle carnosine and may improve high-intensity efforts.
